com.aliyun.oss.crypto

类 CryptoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aliyun.oss.crypto.CryptoConfiguration
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class CryptoConfiguration
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Serializable
    The crypto configuration used to configure storage method of crypto info, content crypto mode, secure random generator and content crypto provider.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
